name: Asian Breast Health Outreach Project (ABHOP)
address: While ABHOP partners with The Women's Imaging in Methodist Richardson Medical Center for screenings, they do not have a standalone physical address for services. Their administrative office is located in Richardson, TX
description: ABHOP provides free mammogram screenings to underserved, uninsured Asian women aged 40 and up in Collin, Dallas, and Denton counties. They also offer breast health seminars in various Asian languages
services: Asian-owned Mammography services in Texas consultation

name: Methodist Richardson Medical Center (The Women's Imaging)
phone: (469) 204-6888 (This number is also listed for ABHOP, indicating a close partnership)
description: This is the facility where ABHOP conducts its mammogram screenings for eligible individuals. They offer a range of women's imaging services
services: Asian-owned Mammography services in Texas consultation

name: Live Healthy Imaging
